You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesM M] > &mu;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Mu;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/039c/index.htm U+0039C].
  * `&mu;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03bc/index.htm U+003BC].
